en_US.bulkEnrollmentInstructions:
• CSV file has 2 columns - Username and CourseID
  • CourseID refers to the Moodle ID of a course
  • CSV file has to be uploaded without any changes to its formatting
  • In case, the admin deletes/modifies any of the available headers in the CSV file, it will be treated as an invalid CSV file and hence none of the user enrollment would happen
  • After complete processing of the CSV file, a report will be emailed to the admin

en_US.aboutCiscoContentPara1: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge engages, equips, and mobilizes your organization as never before â€” collaborate, learn, and innovate with peers, experts, and social communities anytime, anywhere, and on any device.
en_US.aboutCiscoContentPara2: The following section provides links to support, frequently asked questions, and technical documentation for Cisco Collaborative Knowledge, as well as the proper use of the software.
en_US.supportContent: For immediate support, please contact the Cisco Customer Interaction Network (CIN):
en_US.supportHelp1: Select option 4, End-User Training and Certification.
en_US.supportHelp2: Next, select option 1, Training or Career Certification.
en_US.supportUrlContent: To open an online case for Cisco Collaborative Knowledge go to
en_US.userGuidePara1: Manage content, connect with experts, share knowledge, use social communities, find and register for classes in the catalog, and create personalized learning plans.
en_US.userGuideUrl2: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge Learning Management System Administrator Guide
en_US.userGuidePara2: Manage the course catalog, including sessions, attendees, facilities, locations, notifications, job roles, skills, instructor assignment, and proxy enrollment.
en_US.userGuidePara3: Manage rosters for your courses, including managing attendees and marking attendance for a completed course.
en_US.userGuidePara4: Perform administrative tasks, including managing expertise tags, assigning user roles, and adding assets to the knowledge library.
en_US.quickStartGuideUrl1: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge User Quick Start Guide
en_US.quickStartGuideUrl2: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge Learning Management System Administrator Quick Start Guide
en_US.quickStartGuideUrl3: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge Instructor Quick Start Guide
en_US.quickStartGuideUrl4: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge Administrator Quick Start Guide
en_US.faqContent1: A list of frequently asked questions about Cisco Collaborative Knowledge and its functionality.
en_US.additionalSupportDocsContent1: The At-a-Glance provides a quick overview of key software features and demonstrates the benefits of Cisco Collaborative Knowledge for various users.
en_US.additionalSupportDocsContent2: Cisco Collaborative Knowledge supports the devices, operating systems, and browsers that are listed in this document.
en_US.feedbackContent: Please send us your feedback! We appreciate any and all comments, because your feedback is central to the development of Cisco Collaborative Knowledge. To submit feedback, email

vkmValuesUser.user_biography: Jack love his work.  He is great at data analysis, security and networking as it relates to databases.  Cool stuff.
Peter Parker was bit by a spider and went on to become one of the most prolific software developers of our time.
Best known for his signature, John has also excelled at Project management for many years.
Selina has been working in the field of marketing for over 20 years, while dabbling in various related disciplines.
Katherine has been with Cisco since the early 1990s, helping to build the foundation of the technical programs.
